Devilcat::

Devilcat is thrown back by the blast.  Flipping in midair, he 
transforms to his beast mode, a lion with bat wings.  The warrior 
flies up after Kaiser, returning to robot mode and drawing his sword 
again.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor cursed and transformed quickly to tank mode,  but he was  
> injuried anyway.
> 
>

concussion
